content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":21691,"originalJapaneseLine":"斧槍を放り出して、シーザーがサテラに駆け寄る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Caesar threw away the axe spear and rushed over to Satella."},{"lineNumber":21692,"originalJapaneseLine":"揺さぶるが、反応はなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"He shook her, but there was no response."},{"lineNumber":21693,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シーザー、オ助ケシマス。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Caesar, I'll help you."},{"lineNumber":21694,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラ様、サテラ様……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella-sama, Satella-sama...!\""},{"lineNumber":21695,"originalJapaneseLine":"「終わりました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is it over?\""},{"lineNumber":21696,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………手応えは、あった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...There was a reaction."},{"lineNumber":21697,"originalJapaneseLine":"　念の為、とどめを刺す」","translatedEnglishLine":"Just to be safe, I'll finish it off.\""},{"lineNumber":21698,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オ前…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You...!\""},{"lineNumber":21699,"originalJapaneseLine":"握り直したエスクードソードが、小さく音を鳴らす。","translatedEnglishLine":"The Escudo Sword, gripped firmly again, made a small sound."},{"lineNumber":21700,"originalJapaneseLine":"残るは、魔人の護衛……ガーディアン一体。","translatedEnglishLine":"Only one Guardian, the demon's bodyguard, remained."},{"lineNumber":21701,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それなんですが。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"About that."},{"lineNumber":21702,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうも、そろそろ人が雪崩れ込んできそうです。","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems people are about to swarm in soon."},{"lineNumber":21703,"originalJapaneseLine":"　展開次第で、退路断たれるかもです」","translatedEnglishLine":"Depending on how things unfold, our escape route might be cut off.\""},{"lineNumber":21704,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":21705,"originalJapaneseLine":"勇者とその従者は、血溜まりを蹴って","translatedEnglishLine":"The hero and his retainer kicked the pool of blood,"},{"lineNumber":21706,"originalJapaneseLine":"城から駆け去っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and ran away from the castle."},{"lineNumber":21707,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ただいまーっと……ん、どうした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm back... huh, what's wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":21708,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ご主人様。緊急事態です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Master. It's an emergency."},{"lineNumber":21709,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラ様が侵入者によって重傷を負われました」","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella-sama was seriously injured by an intruder.\""},{"lineNumber":21710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、なんだとっ……！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha- What?!\""},{"lineNumber":21711,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どこのどいつが…………","translatedEnglishLine":"Who the hell was it...?\""},{"lineNumber":21712,"originalJapaneseLine":"「応急処置の最中ですが、傷が深く。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We are in the middle of first aid, but the wound is deep."},{"lineNumber":21713,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヒーラーの方をお貸しください」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please lend us a healer.\""},{"lineNumber":21714,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クルックー！　カフェ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cluck-cluck! Cafe!\""},{"lineNumber":21715,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かりました。いってきます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Understood. I'm going.\""},{"lineNumber":21716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はいよーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right away!\""},{"lineNumber":21717,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":21718,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":21719,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お。どうだ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh. How is it?\""},{"lineNumber":21720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「辛うじて、間に合いました。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We barely made it in time."},{"lineNumber":21721,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人の生命力でなければ即死でした」","translatedEnglishLine":"If it wasn’t for the demon's vitality, she would have died instantly.\""},{"lineNumber":21722,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう大丈夫だから。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She's fine now."},{"lineNumber":21723,"originalJapaneseLine":"　会いに行ってあげたら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why don't you go see her?\""},{"lineNumber":21724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま……そうするか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well... I guess I will.\""},{"lineNumber":21725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「入るぞー、サテラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm coming in, Satella.\""},{"lineNumber":21726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、ランス…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ra-Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":21727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よーう。元気か…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey there. How are you...?\""},{"lineNumber":21728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おふっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oof!?\""},{"lineNumber":21729,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラはランスが部屋に入ってくるや、","translatedEnglishLine":"As soon as Rance entered the room, Satella"},{"lineNumber":21730,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの腹に頭からぶつかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"banged her head into his stomach."},{"lineNumber":21731,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げほごほっ……こら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cough, cough... Hey,"},{"lineNumber":21732,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人の力で思いきりぶつかってくるやつが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"whoever uses demon power to smash into me like that...\""},{"lineNumber":21733,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿者！　この……馬鹿者！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fool! You... fool!"},{"lineNumber":21734,"originalJapaneseLine":"　主が襲われたんだぞ！　どこ行ってたんだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Our master was attacked! Where were you?!"},{"lineNumber":21735,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、危なかったんだぞ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was dangerous...!\""},{"lineNumber":21736,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mmm...\""},{"lineNumber":21737,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラの細い肩が、僅かに震えていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella's slender shoulders trembled slightly."},{"lineNumber":21738,"originalJapaneseLine":"「使徒なんだから……サテラの、側にいろ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You’re my apostle... stay by Satella's side...!\""},{"lineNumber":21739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　…………ばかもの」","translatedEnglishLine":"...you fool.\""},{"lineNumber":21740,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………あー、分かった分かった。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah, I get it, I get it."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 斧槍を放り出して、シーザーがサテラに駆け寄る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caesar threw away the axe spear and rushed over to Satella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 揺さぶるが、反応はなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He shook her, but there was no response.
Just to be safe, I'll finish it off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 握り直したエスクードソードが、小さく音を鳴らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Escudo Sword, gripped firmly again, made a small sound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残るは、魔人の護衛……ガーディアン一体。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only one Guardian, the demon's bodyguard, remained.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうも、そろそろ人が雪崩れ込んできそうです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems people are about to swarm in soon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 展開次第で、退路断たれるかもです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Depending on how things unfold, our escape route might be cut off."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者とその従者は、血溜まりを蹴って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero and his retainer kicked the pool of blood,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城から駆け去っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and ran away from the castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただいまーっと……ん、どうした？」
サテラ様が侵入者によって重傷を負われました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella-sama was seriously injured by an intruder."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「応急処置の最中ですが、傷が深く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are in the middle of first aid, but the wound is deep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヒーラーの方をお貸しください」
「分かりました。いってきます」
魔人の生命力でなければ即死でした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it wasn’t for the demon's vitality, she would have died instantly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会いに行ってあげたら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why don't you go see her?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはランスが部屋に入ってくるや、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As soon as Rance entered the room, Satella

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの腹に頭からぶつかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: banged her head into his stomach.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人の力で思いきりぶつかってくるやつが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: whoever uses demon power to smash into me like that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 主が襲われたんだぞ！　どこ行ってたんだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Our master was attacked! Where were you?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラの細い肩が、僅かに震えていた。
「使徒なんだから……サテラの、側にいろ……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You’re my apostle... stay by Satella's side...!"
"...Ah, I get it, I get it.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Just to be safe, I'll finish it off."
